function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of influenza A virus dependent on relative humidity","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission in dry air environments","Mitigation":"Maintain optimal humidity levels to reduce airborne transmission","Technologies":"Humidification systems, environmental control systems","People":"Occupants of indoor environments, public health","Owner":"Building owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Effect of humidity on virus survival","Impact":"Influence on the stability and survival of different viruses","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to understand the relationship between humidity and virus survival","Technologies":"Laboratory testing, controlled environmental chambers","People":"Virologists, researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Positive and negative influence of temperature on virus survival","Impact":"Temperature can enhance or reduce virus survival in different humidity conditions","Mitigation":"Monitor and control indoor temperatures to complement humidity levels for virus control","Technologies":"Temperature monitoring systems, HVAC systems","People":"Occupants of indoor environments, public health officials","Owner":"Building owners, public health authorities"}]}
